Verses: 1 akkaalaththile, Yesu Oivu Naalil Payirvazhiye Ponaar; Avarudaiya Seeshargal Pasiyaayirundhu, Kadhirgalaik Koithu, Thinnath Thodanginaargal.
2 pariseyar Adhaikkandu, Avarai Nokki: Idho Oivu Naalil Seyyaththagaadhadhai Ummudaiya Seeshargal Seygiraargale Endraargal.
3 adharku Avar: Dhaaveedhum Avanodirundhavargalum Pasiyaayirundhapodhu Seydhadhai Neengal Vaasikkavillaiyaa?
4 avan Dhevanudaiya Veettil Piravesiththu, Aasaariyar Thavira Veroruvarum Pusikkaththagaadha Dhevasamukaththu Appangalaith Thaanum Thannodirundhavargalum Pusiththaargale.
5 andriyum, Oivu Naatkalil Aasaariyargal Dhevaalayaththil Oindhiraamal, Oivu Naalai Velai Naalaakkinaalum Kutramillaadhirukkiraargal Endru Neengal Vedhaththile Vaasikkavillaiyaa?
6 dhevaalayaththilum Periyavar Inge Irukkiraar Endru Ungalukku Sollugiren.
7 baliyaiyalla Irakkaththaiye Virumpbugiren Enbadhin Karuththu Innadhendru Neengal Arindheergalaanaal, Kutramillaadhavargalai Neengal Kutrappaduththamaatteergal.
8 manushakumaaran Oivunaalukkum Aandavaraai Irukkiraar Endraar.
9 avar Avvidam Vittuppoi, Avargaludaiya Jeba Aalayaththil Piravesiththaar.
10 ange Soombina Kaiyaiyudaiya Manushan Oruvan Irundhaan. Appozhudhu Avarmel Kutranjaattumpadikku: Oivu Naalil Sosthamaakkukiradhu Niyaayamaa? Endru Kettaargal.
11  Adharku Avar: Ungalil Endha Manushanukkaagilum Oru Aadu Irundhu, Adhu Oivunaalil Kuzhiyile Vizhundhaal, Adhaippidiththuth Thookkividamaattaano?
12 aaddaippaarkkilum Manushanaanavan Evvalavo Viseshiththirukkiraan! Aadhalaal Oivunaalile Nanmai Seyvadhu Niyaayandhaan Endru Sonnaar.
13 pinbu Andha Manushanai Nokki: Un Kaiyai Neettu Endraar. Avan Neettinaan; Adhu Marukaiyaippola Sosthamaayitru.
14 appozhudhu, Pariseyar Veliyepoi, Avaraik Kolai Seyyumpadi Avarukku Virodhamaai Aalosanaipanninaargal.
15 yesu Adhai Arindhu, Avvidam Vittu Vilagipponaar. Thiralaana Janangal Avarukkup Pinsendraargal; Avargalellaaraiyum Avar Sosthamaakki,
16 thammaip Pirasiththampannaadhapadi Avargalukkuk Kandippaaik Kattalaiyittaar.
17 esaayaa Theerkkadharisiyaal Uraikkappattadhu Niraiverumpadi Ippadi Nadandhadhu. Avan Uraiththadhaavadhu:
18 idho, Naan Therindhukonda Ennudaiya Thaasan, En Aaththumaavukkup Piriyamaayirukkira Ennudaiya Nesan; En Aaviyai Avarmel Amarappannuven, Avar Purajaadhiyaarukku Niyaayaththai Arivippaar.
19 vaakkuvaadham Seyyavumaattaar, Kookkuralidavumaattaar; Avarudaiya Saththaththai Oruvanum Veedhigalil Ketpadhumillai.
20 avar Niyaayaththirku Jeyangidaikkappannugiravaraikkum, Nerindhanaanalai Murikkaamalum, Mangi Erigira Thiriyai Anaikkaamalum Iruppaar.
21 avarudaiya Naamaththinmel Purajaadhiyaar Nambikkaiyaayiruppaargal Enpadhe.
22 appozhudhu, Pisaasu Pidiththa Kurudum Oomaiyumaana Oruvan Avaridaththil Konduvarappattaan; Kurudum Oomaiyumaanavan Pesavung Kaanavundhakkadhaaga Avanai Sosthamaakkinaar.
23  Janangalellaarum Aachchariyappattu: Dhaaveedhin Kumaaran Ivardhaano? Endraargal.
24 pariseyar Adhaikkettu: Ivan Pisaasugalin Thalaivanaagiya Peyalsepoolinaale Pisaasugalaith Thuraththugiraaneyallaamal Matrappadiyalla Endraargal.

25  Yesu Avargal Sindhanaigalai Arindhu, Avargalai Nokki: Thanakkuththaane Virodhamaaip Pirindhirukkira Endha Raajyamum Paazhaaippom; Thanakkuththaane Virodhamaai Pirindhirukkira Endha Pattanamum Endha Veedum Nilainirkamaattaadhu.
26 saaththaanai Saaththaan Thuraththinaal Thanakku Virodhamaagath Thaane Pirivinai Seygiradhaayirukkume; Appadi Seydhaal Avan Raajyam Eppadi Nilainirkum?
27 naan Peyalsepoolinaale Pisaasugalaith Thuraththinaal, Ungal Pillaigal Avaigalai Yaaraale Thuraththugiraargal? Aagaiyaal, Avargale Ungalai Niyaayantheerkkiravargalaayiruppaargal.
28 naan Dhevanudaiya Aaviyinaale Pisaasugalaith Thuraththugirapadiyaal, Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Ungalidaththil Vandhirukkiradhe.
29 andriyum Balavaanai Mundhik Kattinaalozhiyap Balavaanudaiya Veettukkul Oruvan Pugundhu, Avan Udaimaigalai Eppadik Kollaiyidakkoodum? Kattinaaneyaagil, Avan Veettaik Kollaiyidalaam.
30 ennode Iraadhavan Enakku Virodhiyaayirukkiraan; Ennode Serkkaadhavan Sidharadikkiraan.
31 aadhalaal, Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren: Endhappaavamum Endha Thooshanamum Manusharukku Mannikkappadum; Aaviyaanavarukku Virodhamaana Thooshanamo Manusharukku Mannikkappaduvadhillai.

32 evanaagilum Manushakumaaranukku Virodhamaana Vaarththai Sonnaal Adhu Avanukku Mannikkappadum; Evanaagilum Parisuththa Aavikku Virodhamaaga Pesinaal Adhu Immaiyilum Marumaiyilum Avanukku Mannikkappaduvadhillai.
33 maram Nalladhendraal, Adhin Kaniyum Nalladhendru Sollungal; Maram Kettadhendraal, Adhin Kaniyum Kettadhendru Sollungal; Maramaanadhu Adhin Kaniyinaal Ariyappadum.
34 viriyan Paampuk Kuttigale, Neengal Pollaadhavargalaayirukka, Nalamaanavaigalai Eppadi Pesuveergal? Irudhayaththin Niraivinaal Vaai Pesum.
35 nalla Manushan Irudhayamaagiya Nalla Pokkishaththilirundhu Nallavaigalai Eduththukkaattugiraan, Pollaadha Manushan Pollaadha Pokkishaththilirundhu Pollaadhavaigalai Eduththukkaattugiraan.
36 manushar Pesum Veenaana Vaarththaigal Yaavaiyum Kuriththu Niyaayaththeerppunaalile Kanakkoppuvikkavendum Endru Ungalukku Sollugiren.
37 enenil, Un Vaarththaigalinaale Needhimaan Endru Theerkkappaduvaai; Alladhu Un Vaarththaigalinaale Kutravaali Endru Theerkkappaduvaai Endraar.
38 appozhudhu, Vedhapaaragarilum Pariseyarilum Silar Avarai Nokki: Podhagare, Ummaal Oru Adaiyaalaththaik Kaana Virumbugirom Endraargal.

39 avargalukku Avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Indhap Pollaadha Vibasaarach Sandhadhiyaar Adaiyaalaththaith Thedugiraargal; Aanaalum Yonaa Theerkkaththarisiyin Adaiyaalameyandri Vere Adaiyaalam Ivargalukkuk Kodukkappaduvadhillai.
40 yonaa Iravum Pagalum Moondrunaal Oru Periya Meenin Vayitril Irundhadhu Pola, Manushakumaaranum Iravum Pagalum Moondrunaal Boomiyin Irudhayaththil Iruppaar.

41 yonaavin Pirasangaththaik Kettu Ninive Pattanaththaar Manandhirumpinaargal. Idho, Yonaavilum Periyavar Inge Irukkiraar. Aadhalaal Niyaayaththeerppunaalile Ninive Pattanaththaar Indhach Sandhadhiyaarotezhundhu Nindru Ivargalmel Kutranjumaththuvaargal.

42 thendhesaththu Raajasthiree Boomiyin Ellaigalirundhu Saalomonudaiya Gnaanaththaik Ketka Vandhaal. Idho, Saalomonilum Periyavar Inge Irukkiraar. Aadhalaal Niyaayaththeerppunaalile Andha Raajasthiree Indhach Sandhadhiyaarotezhundhu Nindru Ivargalmel Kutranjumaththuvaal.
43 asuththa Aavi Oru Manushanai Vittup Purappadumpodhu, Varanda Idangalil Alaindhu, Ilaippaarudhal Thediyum Kandadaiyaamal:
44 naan Vittu Vandha Veettukkuth Thirumbip Poven Endru Solli; Ange Vandhu, Andha Veetu Verumaiyaakavum, Perukki, Jodikkappattadhaagavum Irukkakkandu,

45 thirumbippoi, Thannilum Pollaadha Veru Ezhu Aavigalaith Thannode Koottikkonduvandhu, Utpugundhu Ange Kudiyirukkum; Appozhudhu, Andha Manushanudaiya Munnilaimaiyilum Avan Pinnilaimai Adhiga Kedulladhaayirukkum; Appadiye Indhap Pollaadha Sandhadhiyaarukkum Sampavikkum Endraar.
46 ippadi Avar Janangalode Pesugaiyil, Avarudaiya Thaayaarum Sagodhararum Avaridaththil Pesavendumendru Veliye Nindraargal.
47 appozhudhu, Oruvan Avarai Nokki: Ummudaiya Thaayaarum Ummudaiya Sagodhararum Ummode Pesavendumendru Veliye Nirkiraargal Endraan.
48 thammidaththil Ippadi Sonnavanukku Avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: En Thaayaar Yaar? En Sagodharar Yaar? Endru Solli,
49 thammudaiya Kaiyaith Thamadhu Seeshargalukku Nere Neetti: Idho, En Thaayum En Sagodhararum Ivargale!
50 paralogaththilirukkira En Pidhaavin Siththaththinpadi Seygiravan Evano Avane Enakku Sagodharanum Sagodhariyum Thaayumaai Irukkiraan Endraar.
